com.barrybecker4.common.concurrency
Class Parallelizer<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.barrybecker4.common.concurrency.Parallelizer<T>

public class Parallelizer<T>
extends java.lang.Object

Using this class you should be able to easily parallelize a set of long running tasks. Immutable.

Method Detail

invokeAllRunnables

public void invokeAllRunnables(java.util.List<java.lang.Runnable> workers)
Invoke all the workers at once and blocks until they are all done. Once all the separate threads have completed their assigned work, you may want to commit the results.

number of threads in the executor thread pool.

Invoke all the workers at once and block until they are all done Once all the separate threads have completed there assigned work, you may want to commit the results.
